mapper.insert: insert into GQPJCXXB (GQPBH, JCSJ, GQPMC, JCR, SSSHENG, SSSHI, SSQX, JCTP1, JCTP2, JCTP3) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sssheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jctp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jctp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jctp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update GQPJCXXB set GQPMC = #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCR = #{jcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSSHENG = #{sssheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSSHI = #{ssshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSQX = #{ssqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCTP1 = #{jctp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCTP2 = #{jctp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCTP3 = #{jctp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GQPBH = #{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JCSJ = #{jcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select: select GQPBH, JCSJ, GQPMC, JCR, SSSHENG, SSSHI, SSQX, JCTP1, JCTP2, JCTP3 from GQPJCXXB
